review_data.title: Malaysian Eats at its best
review_data.content: Typical Malaysian food with a blend of Swiss salads and desserts. If you want to eat something Asian, hot and spicy, yet savoury, this is the place. You’ll surely love it.

review_data.title: Tastes like home
review_data.content: Warm friendly environment with lovely Malaysia/South Asian food. Spacious restaurant, perfect for gathering or smll event.

review_data.title: Good lunch option
review_data.content: I found this restaurant because it was near my hotel, and went at 5pm -- they were already closing, but served me takeaway (thanks!). It's great Malaysian food, and for Switzerland, reasonably priced. It's mainly a lunch place, and has Malaysian food and pasta (popular...More

review_data.title: Good food for lunch
review_data.content: Nice little inhouse asian. Good for a quick lunch. Simple but good food and a charming service. Thursday very good seared duck brwast with great sauce. Recommendable.

review_data.title: Excellent lunch and good value
review_data.content: A very welcoming place with an Asian bent (but they do pasta also). Food is tasty and good portions. If not spicy enough, which is often the case in Switzerland, you have a spice tray on the tables with a bit of kick. Overall a...More

review_data.title: Great curries
review_data.content: One of my favorite places for lunch in Zurich! Located near Hardbruecke, Technopark this is a great little restaurant with super friendly staff and really tasty food. In addition to a nice choice of regular menu items (the fish curry for instance is fantastic) there...More

review_data.title: Nice Malaysian Food
review_data.content: We went for lunch at Chillies today. We ordered Sambal prawn and tandoori satay. Must say that the food is nice but not great. Price-wise is comparable to restaurants in the center of Zurich although they are located out in Hardbrucke. In my opinion, this...More
